children.name: heading
children.description: A heading that is 20-40 characters long that describes the page, which is a landing page where someone would fill out a form to receive a piece of content.

children.name: description
children.description: A few sentences that describe the piece of content the user would receive after filling out the form.

children.name: feature_image
children.description: An image that displays the piece of content that a user would download after filling out a form.

children.name: form
children.description: This is a form that is related to the focus of the page.

children.name: image
children.description: An image that is related to the action that someone should take.

children.name: heading
children.description: A heading that describes an action that someone should take.

children.name: button_text
children.description: The button text that describes the call to action the user should take.
